IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, TREATMENT AND RECOVERY SUPPORTS TO THE RESIDENTS OF BUCKS COUNTY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, TREATMENT AND RECOVERY SUPPORTS TO THE RESIDENTS OF BUCKS COUNTY.
IRS990.Desc: PROGRAMS RESPOND TO THE IMPACT OF DRUG AND ALCOHOL ABUSE. THEY PERFORM FUNCTIONS TO ENSURE THOSE INDIVIDUALS AFFECTED BY DRUG AND ALCOHOL ABUSE HAVE PROPER TREATMENT PROVIDED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMMISSION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND SIMILAR STATE PROVISIONS. HOWEVER, INCOME FROM CERTAIN ACTIVITIES NOT DIRECTLY RELATED TO THE COMMISSION'S TAX-EXEMPT PURPOSE IS SUBJECT TO TAXATION AS UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME. ADDITIONALLY, THE COMMISSION HAS BEEN CLASSIFIED AS AN ORGANIZATION THAT IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION UNDER SECTION 509(A)(2). THE FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD, ON STATEMENTS PERTAINING TO THE ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, PRESCRIBES A RECOGNITION THRESHOLD AND MEASUREMENT ATTRIBUTE FOR THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT RECOGNITION AND MEASUREMENT OF TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN ON A TAX RETURN. THE FEDERAL RETURNS OF THE COMMISSION ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE IRS, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THE RETURNS ARE FILED. THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN FOR THESE YEARS ARE BASED ON CLEAR AND UNAMBIGUOUS TAX LAW; AND MANAGEMENT HAS A HIGH LEVEL OF CONFIDENCE IN THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITIONS TAKEN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A PACKAGE IS PROVIDED BY THE STATE WHICH INCLUDES A QUESTION AND ANSWER DOCUMENT TO BE COMPLETED BY THE GRANTEE. IN ADDITION, WE PERFORM ANNUAL AUDITS IN WHICH WE REVIEW THE MANNER BY WHICH FUNDS ARE UTILIZED AS WELL AS REVIEW THE GRANTEE AUDITS PERFORMED BY THEIR INDEPENDENT AUDITORS.
THE FORM IS REVIEWED BY THE INDEPENDENT FISCAL CONSULTANT AND PRESENTED TO THE TREASURER AND THE ENTIRE BOARD AT A BOARD MEETING.
THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY WITH THE BOARD.
SALARIES ARE REVIEWED ANNUALLY, COMPARED TO THE SALARIES OFFERED BY OTHER ORGANIZATIONS AND ANY CORRESPONDING ADJUSTMENTS ARE THEN BOARD APPROVED.
SALARIES ARE REVIEWED ANNUALLY, COMPARED TO THE SALARIES OFFERED BY OTHER ORGANIZATIONS AND ANY CORRESPONDING ADJUSTMENTS ARE THEN BOARD APPROVED.
FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE ON GUIDESTAR. ALL OTHER DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
